name: Gemstones Crush
description:
Gemstones Crush is a match three game that is easy to learn but difficult to master. It is a nonstop blitz of cute gemstones!

Be aware of the Deranged Ninja Thief! He wants to steal your precious gemstones: Aquamarine, Topaz, Sapphire, Peridot, Amethyst, Ruby and Emerald.

The game is simple. Line up three or more identical gemstones vertically or horizontally. Earn tons of tokens along the way and use them to buy fun Powerups.

Game Features:

**DIG THE ULTRA-COOL DESIGN**
Check out the sweetest graphics and groove to original songs and sound effects as you bust a move, DX style.

**TRY 3 MODES OF GAMEPLAY**
Levels – Test your skills and become the best.
Timed – Match as many gemstones as you can as the clock winds down.
Endless – Swipe, dash, and crush to your heart's content and earn tons of tokens.

**EARN COOL POWERUPS**
Philosophical Stone – Create any gemstone to help with your matching mania.
Magic Net – Eliminate all of one type of gemstone tile in one big blast!
Ninja Thief Jail Trap – Catch the Ninja Thief and get him off the screen.
Clues – Find elusive matches and solve the puzzle.

**CHOOSE A BACKGROUND**
Pick from Loose in the Grass, Desert, City, Night or Space!

**MAKE THE GEMSTONES FACETED**
Match four gemstones to make one faceted. Match two more tiles with the faceted one, and watch all the adjacent tiles pop!

**PROVE YOUR PROWESS**
Play to beat your high score, earn tokens, and redeem them for helpful Powerups on your way to match3 mastery.
